00027 void SetOutputFile(RootWriter* writer, const char* inputfile){
00028  if( writer->GetFilename() == writer->GetDefaultFilename() ){
00029     //set the filename to be the input filename + .root
00030     std::string fname(inputfile);
00031     //remove any trailing slashes if this is a directory
00032     while(!fname.empty() && *(fname.rbegin()) == '/')
00033       fname.resize(fname.size()-1);
00034     //remove leading directories
00035     if(fname.rfind('/') != std::string::npos){
00036       fname = fname.substr(fname.rfind('/')+1);
00037     }
00038     //remove filename suffix
00039     fname = fname.substr(0, fname.find('.'));
00040     //append the root filename
00041     fname.append(".root");
00042     writer->SetFilename(fname);
00043   }
00044 }
00045 
00047 int ProcessOneFile(const char* filename, std::string event_file, int max_event=-1, int min_event=0)
00048 {
00049   Message(INFO)<<"\n***************************************\n"
00050                <<"  Processing File "<<filename
00051                <<"\n***************************************\n";
00052   EventHandler* modules = EventHandler::GetInstance();
00053   Reader reader(filename);
00054   if(modules->Initialize()){
00055     Message(ERROR)<<"Unable to initialize all modules.\n";
00056     return 1;
00057   }
00058   
00059   //read through the file and process all events
00060   time_t start_time = time(0);
00061   RawEventPtr raw;
00062   
00063   //if the first event is not 0, read it to get start of run info
00064   if(min_event != 0){
00065     ConvertData* converter = modules->GetModule<ConvertData>();
00066     if(converter){ 
00067       raw = reader.GetEventWithID(0);
00068       if(!raw){
00069         Message(ERROR)<<"Problem encountered reading event "<<min_event
00070                       <<std::endl;
00071         return 1;
00072       }
00073       EventPtr evt(new Event(raw));
00074       converter->Process(evt);
00075       //if the first event is not 1, read the event immediately before to get dt
00076       if(min_event > 1){
00077         raw = reader.GetEventWithID(min_event-1);
00078         if(!raw){
00079           Message(ERROR)<<"Problem encountered reading event "<<min_event
00080                         <<std::endl;
00081           return 1;
00082         }
00083         evt.reset(new Event(raw));
00084         converter->Process(evt);
00085       }
00086     }
00087   }
00088   
00089   //Get the first event by ID
00090   raw = reader.GetEventWithID(min_event);
00091 
00092 
00093   //if using event list, open the event list file
00094   std::ifstream eventlist;
00095   bool use_elist = false;
00096   if (event_file!="") {
00097     eventlist.open(event_file.c_str());
00098     if (!eventlist.is_open()){
00099       Message(ERROR)<<"Unable to open event-list file "<<event_file<<endl;
00100       return 1;
00101     }
00102     use_elist = true;
00103   }
00104   if (use_elist) {
00105     //find first event in list greater than min_event
00106     int tmp_event;
00107     eventlist>>tmp_event;
00108     while (min_event > tmp_event && !eventlist.eof())
00109       eventlist>>tmp_event;
00110     if (eventlist.eof()) {
00111       Message(INFO)<<"No events to process!"<<std::endl;
00112       return 1;
00113     }
00114     min_event = tmp_event;
00115     raw = reader.GetEventWithID(min_event);
00116   }
00117 
00118   if(!raw){
00119     Message(ERROR)<<"Problem encountered reading event "<<min_event<<std::endl;
00120     return 1;
00121   }
00122   int evtnum = 0;
00123   while(raw){
00124     if(max_event > 0 && raw->GetID() >= (uint32_t)max_event) 
00125       break;
00126     //Message(DEBUG)<<"*************Event "<<evtnum<<"**************\n";
00127     if(evtnum%5000 == 0 && !use_elist)
00128         Message(INFO)<<"Processing event "<<raw->GetID()<<std::endl;
00129     else if (use_elist)
00130         Message(INFO)<<"Processing event "<<raw->GetID()<<std::endl;
00131     ++evtnum;
00132     if(modules->Process(raw)){
00133       if(raw)
00134         Message(ERROR)<<"Error processing event "<<raw->GetID()<<"\n";
00135       break;
00136     }
00137 
00138     //if using event list, read next event number to process
00139     if (use_elist) {
00140       int next_event;
00141       if (eventlist>>next_event) {
00142         raw = reader.GetEventWithID(next_event);
00143       }
00144       else {
00145         Message(INFO)<<"Reached end event-list file.\n";
00146         break;
00147       }
00148     }
00149     else {
00150       raw = reader.GetNextEvent();
00151     }
00152   }
00153   eventlist.close();
00154 
00155   //finish up
00156   modules->Finalize();
00157   Message(INFO)<<"Processed "<<evtnum<<" events in "
00158                <<time(0) - start_time<<" seconds. \n";
00159   return 0;
00160 }
00161 
00162 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00163 {
00164   int max_event=-1, min_event = 0;
00165   ConfigHandler* config = ConfigHandler::GetInstance();
00166   config->SetProgramUsageString("genroot [options] <file1> [<file2>, ... ]");
00167   config->AddCommandSwitch(' ',"max","last event to process",
00168                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<int>(max_event),
00169                            "event");
00170   config->AddCommandSwitch(' ',"min","first event to process",
00171                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<int>(min_event),
00172                            "event");
00173   std::string event_file = "";
00174   config->AddCommandSwitch(' ',"event-list","read events to process from <file>",
00175                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<std::string>(event_file),
00176                            "file");
00177   
00178   EventHandler* modules = EventHandler::GetInstance();
00179   modules->AddCommonModules();
00180   modules->AddModule<AverageWaveforms>();
00181   //modules->AddModule<GenericAnalysis>();
00182   RootWriter* writer = modules->AddModule<RootWriter>();
00183 
00184   try{
00185     //config->ReadFromFile("genroot.cfg");
00186     config->SetDefaultCfgFile("cfg/genroot.cfg");
00187     config->ProcessCommandLine(argc,argv);
00188   }
00189   catch(std::exception& e){
00190     Message(EXCEPTION)<<"While processing command line: "<<e.what()<<std::endl;
00191     config->PrintSwitches(true);
00192   }
00193 
00194   if(argc < 2){
00195     Message(ERROR)<<"Incorrect number of arguments: "<<argc<<std::endl;
00196     config->PrintSwitches(true);
00197   }
00198   
00199   for(int i = 1; i<argc; i++){
00200     if(i > 1)
00201       writer->SetFilename(writer->GetDefaultFilename());
00202     SetOutputFile(writer, argv[i] );
00203     if(ProcessOneFile(argv[i], event_file, max_event, min_event)){
00204       Message(ERROR)<<"Error processing file "<<argv[i]<<"; aborting.\n";
00205       return 1;
00206     }
00207   }
00208   return 0;
00209 }
